name: ....Where the Hell are we?
effect: Your opponent and you may each draw up to 3 cards. If played in Milwaukee, WI at GEN CON you may each draw up to 4 cards, instead of 3 cards.
"Greetings to our fans here in… Where are we? Oh, Okay - greetings to our fans here in Santiago, Chile!" - Edge

name: 3D (Dudley Boyz logo)
effect:
Unique
As a maneuver, the card titled Irish Whip must be played before playing this card. If played from your hand, may reverse any Strike, Grapple or the card titled Irish Whip, and end your opponent's turn.
"Good God! Not the Dudley Death Drop." - Jim Ross

name: Armageddon
effect: As an action, if your opponent does not win the game by the end of his third turn from now, he may discard his hand. If he does not, he puts all cards from his Ring area into his Ringside pile. End your turn. As a reversal, this card is -10F, reverse any Active, Unique or Superstar specific card and end your opponent's turn.

name: Babe of the Year (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 6. Superstar Value: 4. Diva Superstar Ability: Once during each of your turns, you may discard 1 card and then remove up to 2 cards in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game. You may pack any cards with the Trish Stratus logo, but you do not count as Trish Stratus.

name: Backlash (alternate art)
effect: Only playable if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating and your opponent has successfully played a maneuver against you this turn. Reverse any Strike, Grapple or Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

name: Batista (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 8. Superstar Value: 3. Superstar Ability: Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the words “spine buster” or “spinebuster” in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Your cards with the words “spine buster” or “spinebuster” in the title are -10F. Your opponent’s Reversal cards are D: 0.

name: Big Poppa Pump (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 8. Superstar Value: 4. Superstar Ability: During your turn, you may discard any number of cards and your next maneuver card played this turn is -4F for each card discarded. You cannot play more than two maneuvers per turn.

name: Brock Lesnar (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 7. Superstar Value: 4. Superstar Ability: Your opponents Strike maneuvers played do no more than a maximum of 3D. You may play the card titled No Sell Maneuver.

name: Carlito (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 1. Superstar Value: 3. Superstar Ability: During your Draw Segment, draw an additional 3 cards. Your cards titled Spit at Opponent are -4F and not Heel cards. Your opponent cannot play any card with the word “cool” in the title.

name: Cause I am... That... Damn... Good! (Triple H logo) (FOIL)
effect:
Unique
Reverse any Non-Trademark Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Draw up to 3 cards.
"…do you need me to beat the words into you?" - Triple H

name: Cheap Pops All Around!
effect: Put up to # cards with the words "cheap pop" in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand, where # is equal to the number of cards in your Ring area with the words "cheap pop" in the title. Your opponent puts up to # cards with the words "cheap pop" in the title from his Ringside pile into his hand, where # is equal to the number of cards in his Ring area with the words "cheap pop" in the title. When played in Columbus, OH at Origins, you may shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

name: Cheap Pops Rule!
effect: Search your Arsenal for any number of non-unique cards with the words "cheap pop" in the title, put them into your Ringside pile, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and put 1 card with the words "cheap pop" in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand.

name: Chris Masters (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 4. Superstar Value: 3. Superstar Ability: When your opponent reverses a maneuver from his hand, you may look at his hand, choose 1 card, and remove the chosen card from the game. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word “maintain” in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: Crippler Crossface
effect:
Unique
As a maneuver, you may play the card titled Maintain Hold after this card as if it were a Submission maneuver. As a reversal, may reverse any Grapple or Strike maneuver but you must first discard 1 card.
"An absolutely devastating hold!" - Jim Ross

name: Critical Injury
effect: Can only be played after a 5D maneuver. While this card is in your Ring Area, your opponent's Superstar Ability is considered to read as blank text (Superstar Abilities relating to Arsenal construction are not effected)
"I think he's just ended his career, that's not the kinda thing you recover from!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler"

name: Do You Smell What The Rock is Cookin'?
effect:
[Collector's Tin Boxed Set Exclusive Bonus Card]
Your next CARD can not be reversed. Draw 1 card.
Unique
"The People's Champion is serving up something!" - Jim Ross

name: Do You Smell What the Rock is Cookin’? (The Rock logo) (FOIL)
effect:
Unique
[Collector's Tin Boxed Set Exclusive Bonus Card] Your next CARD can not be reversed. Draw 1 card.
"The People's Champion is serving up something!" - Jim Ross

name: DX (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 6. Superstar Value: 9. Tag Team Superstar Ability: You may pack cards with the Triple H or Shawn Michaels logo, but you do not count as those Superstars. At the end of your Pre-match phase, you may discard 2 cards and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with exactly 2 words in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: Edge & Christian (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 5. Superstar Value: 4. Superstar Ability: If you must discard a card or cards whenever a maneuver or reversal card is played, you may instead draw an equal number of cards. You may not play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts.

name: Edge (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: #. Superstar Value: 3. Superstar Ability: Your Starting Hand Size is equal to twice your opponent's total Star Value. If this number is 6 or less, then your Starting Hand Size is 6. At the start of the match you always go first.

name: Evolution (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 10. Superstar Value: 10. Superstar Ability: You can pack the Tag Team Title Belts. At the start of your turn, before your Draw Segment, look at the top 3 cards of your Arsenal, put them back in any order, and then overturn 2 cards. Once during each of your turns you may discard 3 cards, overturn 3 cards, and then put 1 card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. If that card is a maneuver of 0F, your opponent may shuffle it into his Arsenal.

name: Flying Body Press
effect: Can only be played after a 5D or greater maneuver. If this maneuver is reversed from your opponent's hand, you must discard 3 cards.
"Extremely high risk maneuver on his part but it has turned this match completely around!" - Jim Ross

name: Fortitude Surge
effect: Can only be played in your opponent has just played or used a card that applies a Fortitude modifier to your reversals, opponent continues his turn. When this card is in your Ring area, you may put it in your Ringside pile and your reversal cards are unaffected by any Fortitude modifiers for the remainder of the turn.

name: Four Years in the Making: Survivor Series 3
effect:
Unique
Can only be played when you have 4 or more cards in your hand. Discard your hand, then put up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile on top of your Arsenal, then search your Arsenal for up to 3 cards with the Survivor Series logo, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: Gen Con 2005
effect: Your opponent’s Starting Hand Size is -1. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then put 1 card with the word “hell” in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand. Universally Active. Permanent.

name: Hitting the G-Spot (FOIL)
effect:
Unique
Cannot be played by a Male superstar. Can only be played after a successfully played Grapple maneuver. Blank that maneuver's text and end your opponent's turn. The maneuver does it's normal damage, regardless of overturned Reversal cards. Put those overturned cards on top of this card instead of in your Ringside pile. During your turn, you may skip your Draw Segment and then put up to 4 cards on top of this card into your hand, put the rest into your Ringside pile, and end your turn.

name: Hollywood Hulk Hogan (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 9. Superstar Value: 6. Superstar Ability: The non-unique non-Strike Maneuvers cards in your Arsenal may only be titled Body Slam, Elbow Drop, Headlock Takedown, Press Slam, Scoop Slam and Standing Side Headlock. You may play the card titled No Sell Maneuver.

name: Insurrextion
effect:
Unique
Can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating and if you have fewer Reversal cards in your Ring Area than your opponent. When played from your hand, reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent discards # cards, where # is equal to the number of Reversal cards your opponent has in his Ring Area more than you.

name: Jerichoholics (Chris Jericho logo) (FOIL)
effect:
Unique
Draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area and an opponent forces you to discard a card, you may instead place this card back into your hand instead of discarding.

name: Kurt Angle (Superstar card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 6. Superstar Value: 3. Superstar Ability: Your Kurt Angle Arsenal may contain both FACE and HEEL cards.

name: Mae Young (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 0. Superstar Value: 0. Superstar Ability: You cannot play maneuvers of 3D or greater. Your Arsenal may only contain 45 cards. Your cards titled Puppies! Puppies! are Set-up cards, -10F, and read as "Shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, draw 2 cards, your opponent overturns 2 cards, and end your turn."

name: No More Cheap Pops
effect: Cannot be reversed if the card titled Really Going For the Cheap Pop! is in your Ring area. Look at your opponent's Backlash deck. If played in Columbus, Ohio at Origins, your opponent must also discard 1 card from his hand. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent cannot play any cards with the word "cheap" in the title.

name: No Way Out
effect:
Unique
Before every Draw Segment, all players overturn 1 card. Throwback.

name: Origins 2005
effect: Your Starting Hand Size is +1. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then put 1 card with the word “cheap” in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand. Universally Active. Permanent.

name: Osaka, Japan
effect: At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may discard a Reversal card and then search your Arsenal for a non-unique Reversal card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. He may then discard a Maneuver card and search his Arsenal for a non-unique Maneuver card, reveal it to you, put it into his hand, and shuffle his Arsenal. Universally Active. Permanent.

name: Patented Austin Kick to the Gut
effect:
[Mass Market Retailers Boxed Set Exclusive Bonus Card]
When successfully played, you may draw 1 card.
Your next maneuver played is -6F.
"The 3:16 Express is gearing up!" - Jim Ross

name: Patented Austin Kick to the Gut (Stone Cold Steve Austin logo) (FOIL)
effect: [Mass Market Retailers Boxed Set Exclusive Bonus Card] When successfully played you may draw 1 card. Your next maneuver played is -6F.
"The 3:16 Express is gearing up!" - Jim Ross

name: Patented Rock Footstomp
effect:
[Mass Market Retailers Boxed Set Exclusive Bonus Card]
When successfully played, you may draw 1 card or shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile back into your Arsenal.
"The Chosen One knows how to lay the Smackdown!" - Jim Ross

name: Patented Rock Footstomp (The Rock logo) (FOIL)
effect: [Mass Market Retailers Boxed Set Exclusive Bonus Card] When successfully played, you may draw 1 card or shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile back into your Arsenal.
"The Chosen One knows how to lay the Smackdown!" - Jim Ross

name: Piledriver
effect: [Special Exclusive Card for InQuest Magazine] When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.
"Good God, I can't look at this! He's finished." - Jim Ross

name: Piledriver
effect:
[Special Exclusive Card for InQuest Magazine]
When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.
Stun Value: 1
"Good God, I can't look at this! He's finished." - Jim Ross

name: Rattlesnake Rulz
effect:
[Collector's Tin Boxed Set Exclusive Bonus Card]
Your next CARD can not be reversed. Draw 1 card.
Unique
"Never trust a rattlesnake, never!" - Jim Ross

name: Rattlesnake Rulz (Stone Cold Steve Austin logo) (FOIL)
effect:
Unique
[Collector's Tin Boxed Set Exclusive Bonus Card] Your next CARD can not be reversed. Draw 1 card.
"Never trust a rattlesnake, never!" - Jim Ross

name: Really Going for a Cheap Pop
effect: Discard up to 3 cards from your hand, then draw the same number of cards you discarded. If played in Columbus, OH at Origins you may discard up to 4 cards instead of 3 cards.
"The title's on the line, right here, tonight in Columbus!" Mick Foley

name: Rob Van Dam (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 6. Superstar Value: 3. Superstar Ability: Once a turn, you may discard a maneuver card to make the next maneuver card you play -XF, where X is equal to the F of the card you discarded. You may have 2 more than the maximum number of Mid-match cards allowed in your Ring area. Your Chair Shot cards are not considered HEEL cards.

name: Rumblings
effect:
Unique
Name Face, Heel, Raw, SmackDown!, Chain, Heat, Throwback, or Volley. Your opponent searches his Arsenal for 1 card of the named type, reveals it to you, puts it into his hand, and shuffles his Arsenal. Then search your Arsenal for 1 card of the named type, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: Ruthless Aggression
effect:
Unique
When this card is in your Ring area, before your Draw Segment, you must overturn the top 2 cards from your Arsenal into your Ringside pile. Put all Maneuver cards overturned in this manner into your hand. If none of the overturned cards are Maneuver cards, put this card into your Ringside pile.

name: Sergeant Slaughter (Superstar Card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 7. Superstar Value: 3. Legend Superstar Ability: You cannot pack High Risk maneuvers. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 Throwback maneuver, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: Spinnerooni (Booker T logo)
effect:
Unique
As an action, draw 3 cards or search your Arsenal for any 1 card and place it into your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal. If your next card played this turn is titled Spinning T Kick, it cannot be reversed. As a reversal, can reverse any type of maneuver. Opponent's maneuver stays in his Ring area but has no other effect. Take the appropriate amount of damage, ignoring any overturned reversals and end this turn. If the first card you play on your next turn is titled Booker's Scissor Kick or Spinning T Kick, it cannot be reversed.

name: Stacy Keibler (Superstar Card) (FOIL)
effect: Starting Hand Size: ? Superstar Value: ? Diva Superstar Ability: Who says pretty gals can't wrestle? Stacy and the rest of the Divas are ready to strip your Arsenals and lay you out on the mat! Get a leg up on the competition, Coming February 2004.

name: Stone Cold Steve Austin (Superstar card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 5. Superstar Value: 5. Superstar Ability: Once during your turn, you may draw an additional card, but then you must take a card from your hand and put it on the bottom of your arsenal.

name: Stone Cold Stunner
effect:
Unique
-6F on this card if played after the maneuver titled Kick.
"Stunner, Stunner, Stunner!!! The Rattlesnake Strikes Again!" - Jim Ross

name: Suicide Strike
effect:
Unique
If this card is reversed from your opponent's hand or Backlash deck, you both overturn 5 cards. When successfully played, remove the top 10 cards of your Arsenal from the game. Multi.

name: Summer of Slam (Al Snow, Hall and Nash, Ric Flair, Hollywood Hulk Hogan, Billy and Chuck, Hurricane, Tajiri, Trish Stratus logos)
effect: At the end of the Pre-match phase, if your Superstar opponent is not on this card, he must randomly discard 1 card from his Backlash deck to his Ringside pile.

name: Survivor Series (FOIL)
effect:
Unique
Can only be played when you have a card in your Ring area with a Survivor Series logo and a card in your Ring area without a Survivor Series logo. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then remove any number of cards in your Ringside pile from the game and then shuffle up to the same number of cards with a Survivor Series logo from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

name: Sweet Chin Music (Shawn Michaels logo)
effect:
Unique
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver. As an action, this card is -30F, discard this card and put 1 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand. Doing this will cause no damage to your opponent. As a reversal, when played from your hand, reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent’s turn.

name: The <Raw Deal logo> Revolution
effect:
Unique
Reverse any non-unique card that has four or more lines of printed card text and end your opponent’s turn.

name: The Great American Bash
effect:
Unique
When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then remove any number of cards in your Ringside pile from the game and draw 4 cards for every 7 cards removed in this way.

name: The People's Elbow
effect:
Unique
As a maneuver, this card can only be played immediately after the card titled Rock Bottom. As an action, place this card back in your arsenal, shuffle, then draw 2 cards. Doing this will not cause any damage to opponent.
"It's over jabroni, the People Know It!" - The Rock

name: The Rock (Superstar card)
effect: Starting Hand Size: 5. Superstar Value: 5. Superstar Ability: At the start of your turn, before you draw a card, you may take 1 card from your ringside pile and put it on the bottom of your arsenal.

name: Tonight I Unleash Hell
effect:
Unique
Cannot be reversed when played by Stone Cold Steve Austin or The Rattlesnake. Remove all cards in your hand from the game and put all cards in your Ringside pile into your hand. During your next turn, before your Draw Segment, discard your hand and then put cards from your Ringside pile into your hand equal to the number of cards in your Ring area with the word “hell” in the title. Permanent.

name: Unforgiven
effect:
Unique
Can only be played when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent’s Fortitude Rating. Put 1 Maneuver card from your opponent’s Ring area into his Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, if your opponent reverses a maneuver from his hand, you may put this card into your Ringside pile, search your Arsenal for 1 Maneuver card with Stun Value, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Throwback.

name: Vengeance
effect:
Unique
When this card is in your Ring area, when your opponent reverses a maneuver from his hand and your Fortitude Rating is less than his Fortitude Rating, look at his hand, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card.
"Vengeance, Raw Deal expansion, in stores everywhere August 2004" - Howard Finkel

name: Where the Hell Is This?
effect: Search your Arsenal for any number of non-unique cards with the word "hell" in the title, put them into your Ringside pile, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and put 1 card with the word "hell" in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand.

name: Why the Hell Are We Back?
effect: Cannot be reversed if the card titled Where the Hell Are We? is in your Ring area. Put 1 Backlash deck card from your Ringside pile into your Backlash deck. If played in Milwaukee, Wisconsin at Gen Con, you may also draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent cannot play any card with the word "why" in the title.

name: Why the Hell Are We Here?
effect: Discard # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards with the word "hell" in the title in your opponent's Ring area. Your opponent discards # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards with the word "hell" in the title in your Ring area. When played in Indianapolis, IN at GenCon, you may shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

name: You Talkin’ to Me?
effect:
Unique
Cannot be reversed when your Superstar Value is less than your opponent’s Superstar Value. Put cards from your opponent’s Ring area into his Ringside pile equal to the number of cards in your Ring area with the words “cheap pop” in the title +1.

name: You're Drafted
effect:
Unique
Your Factions have your Superstar logo. All players draw up to 1 card.

name: “Your Town”
effect: Once a player has played a Feud, Stipulation, Manager, or Object, he cannot play any of those types of cards during the Pre-match phase. Universally Active. Permanent.
